title: Extended: grab Apple's M4 Pro MacBook Pro for $1,699 for 2 days only
description: The $1,699 M4 Pro MacBook Pro special price is now available at B&H Photo, with free next day delivery.Snap up a 14-inch MacBook Pro at a record low price.After a price war broke out on Apple's M4 Pro MacBook Pro 14-inch during Christmas Eve, several retailers sold out or ended the $300 discount soon thereafter. But the $1,699 price is still available at Apple Authorized Reseller B&H Photo, with free next business day delivery available in the contiguous U.S. on the standard M4 Pro configuration in Space Black or Silver.Buy for $1,699 Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: The $1,699 M4 Pro MacBook Pro special price is now available at B&H Photo, with free next day delivery.
text: The $1,699 M4 Pro MacBook Pro special price is now available at B&H Photo, with free next day delivery. After a price war broke out on Apple's M4 Pro MacBook Pro 14-inch during Christmas Eve, several retailers sold out or ended the $300 discount soon thereafter. But the $1,699 price is still available at Apple Authorized Reseller B&H Photo, with free next business day delivery available in the contiguous U.S. on the standard M4 Pro configuration in Space Black or Silver. Buy for $1,699 This retail spec has Apple's M4 Pro chip with a 12-core CPU and 16-core GPU. It also has 24GB of unified memory and 512GB of storage, making it a well-equipped spec for a large subset of users. The $300 cash discount, which can be found alongside others in our M4 Pro MacBook Pro 14-inch Price Guide, is valid through Dec. 28 only. B&H closes for 24 hours at sundown Eastern Time on Fridays in observance of Shabbat, so it's best to order now to lock in the deal. You can also find deals on hundreds of other Mac models, including the M4 Mac mini and M3 MacBook Air, in our Mac Price Guide.
html:
The $1,699 M4 Pro MacBook Pro special price is now available at B&H Photo, with free next day delivery.

After a price war broke out on Apple's M4 Pro MacBook Pro 14-inch during Christmas Eve, several retailers sold out or ended the $300 discount soon thereafter. But the $1,699 price is still available at Apple Authorized Reseller B&H Photo, with free next business day delivery available in the contiguous U.S. on the standard M4 Pro configuration in Space Black or Silver.

Buy for $1,699

This retail spec has Apple's M4 Pro chip with a 12-core CPU and 16-core GPU. It also has 24GB of unified memory and 512GB of storage, making it a well-equipped spec for a large subset of users.

The $300 cash discount, which can be found alongside others in our M4 Pro MacBook Pro 14-inch Price Guide, is valid through Dec. 28 only. B&H closes for 24 hours at sundown Eastern Time on Fridays in observance of Shabbat, so it's best to order now to lock in the deal.

You can also find deals on hundreds of other Mac models, including the M4 Mac mini and M3 MacBook Air, in our Mac Price Guide.
